Create PCA object

```{r}
pca <- prcomp(t(sigFpkmNormalisedCounts), center=True, scale=TRUE)
scores <- data.frame(targets$sampleID, pca$x[,1:2])
```

Create QC plot and save in PDF format

```{r}
pointSize <- 0.4
pdf(paste("output/PCA.pdf", sep = ""))
ggplot(scores, aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, label=factor(targets$sampleID), colour=factor(targets$Condition))) + geom_text(size=2.5) + scale_colour_discrete(name="condition")

dev.off()
```
